summary.span: 提供基底類別給儲存於 中的組件。

span.span: Provides a base class for parts stored in a .

summary.span: 這個類別是抽象的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必須是有效的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]形成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格和[開放式封裝慣例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)規格。`partUri` must be valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. 使用這個建構函式時組件不立即知道，且將稍後當呼叫。Use this constructor when the of the part is not immediately known and will be set later when is called. 根據預設，組件的屬性會初始化為。By default, the property of the part is initialized to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必須是有效的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]形成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格和[開放式封裝慣例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)規格。`partUri` must be valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. 根據預設，組件的屬性會初始化為。By default, the property of the part is initialized to . `contentType` 必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]按照所使用的型別形成[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文字傳輸通訊協定為 HTTP*，3.7 > 一節。`contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表顯示的內容範例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中使用的類型[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|內容類型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字型Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 設定檔ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 影像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |模糊的字型Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 影像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 影像TIFF image|tiff 影像 /image/tiff| |Windows 媒體相片影像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必須是有效的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]形成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格和[開放式封裝慣例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)規格。`partUri` must be valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. `contentType` 必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]按照所使用的型別形成[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文字傳輸通訊協定為 HTTP*，3.7 > 一節。`contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表顯示的內容範例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中使用的類型[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|內容類型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字型Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 設定檔ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 影像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |模糊的字型Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 影像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 影像TIFF image|tiff 影像 /image/tiff| |Windows 媒體相片影像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可存取的唯讀屬性時，才父已開啟。 is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent is open. 屬性會自動設定建構函式。The property is automatically set by the constructor. 建構函式，設定之後無法變更。After it is set by the constructor, the cannot be changed. 屬性是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]按照所使用的型別形成[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文字傳輸通訊協定為 HTTP*，3.7 > 一節。The property is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表顯示的內容範例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中使用的類型[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|內容類型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字型Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 設定檔ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 影像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |模糊的字型Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 影像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 影像TIFF image|tiff 影像 /image/tiff| |Windows 媒體相片影像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

summary.span: 建立這個 和指定目標 或外部資源之間的組件層級關係。

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件層級關聯性定義這個組件的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 組件層級關聯性可以有兩種形式。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 來源之間目標內。Between a source to a target inside the . - 來源之間於封裝之外的目標資源。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在組件關聯性來源組件會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除來源組件時，會一併刪除的部分所擁有的所有關聯性。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 建立或刪除的關聯性的程序不會實際變更的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 方法不會實際變更來源組件，或目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 關聯性的目標不能是另一個關聯性。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如需封裝關聯性詳細資訊，請參閱區段 1.3*開放封裝慣例 (OPC)* 規格下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 如需 XPS 文件，請參閱*開啟 XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship (Uri targetUri, System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship(class System.Uri targetUri, valuetype System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType) cil managed
public: System::IO::Packaging::PackageRelationship ^ CreateRelationship(Uri ^ targetUri, System::IO::Packaging::TargetMode targetMode, System::String ^ relationshipType);

param.name: targetUri
param.span: 目標組件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.

param.name: targetMode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

param.span: 例如，如果目標組件位於 內部，就是 ，如果目標組件是 外部的資源，就是 。

span.span: For example, if the target part is inside the ; or if the target is a resource outside the .

param.name: relationshipType
param.span: 關聯性的角色。

span.span: The role of the relationship.

summary.span: 建立這個 和指定目標 或外部資源之間的組件層級關係。

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

returns.span: 這個 與目標 或外部資源之間的組件層級關係。

span.span: The part-level relationship between this to the target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件層級關聯性定義這個組件的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 組件層級關聯性可以有兩種形式。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 來源之間目標內。Between a source to a target inside the . - 來源之間於封裝之外的目標資源。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在組件關聯性來源組件會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除來源組件時，會一併刪除的部分所擁有的所有關聯性。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 建立或刪除的關聯性的程序不會實際變更的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 方法不會實際變更來源組件，或目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 關聯性的目標不能是另一個關聯性。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如果`targetMode`指定為，`targetUri`必須是相對 URI，按照所使用的正確[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 內部的相對 URI 可以是絕對路徑，開頭為斜線 （"/"） 字元例如"/ page1.xaml"或"/ images/picture4.jpg"，或相對路徑，例如 「.../ imagespicture1.jpg"解析針對封裝根目錄 （"/"） 做為基底 URI。The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI. 如果`targetMode`指定為，`targetUri`可以是任一個絕對或相對 URI 格式根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 一般語法*規格。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 「http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml」 是絕對 URI 參照外部的目標資源 」 page2.xml 」 的範例。"http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml". 「 images/picture1.jpg"是相對 URI，也會參考外部的目標資源 」 1.jpg"但可解析針對封裝本身的 URI 的範例。"images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself. `relationshipType` 必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，形成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。`relationshipType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 不同的封裝類型可以定義不同的組件層級關聯性類型。Different package types can define different part-level relationship types. 下表顯示組件層級`relationshipType`Uri 定義文件符合*開啟 XML Paper Specification (XPS)*。The following table shows the part-level `relationshipType` URIs defined for documents that conform to the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*. |XPS 文件組件層級關聯性XPS Document Part-Level Relationship|URI 的關聯性類型Relationship Type URI| |-------------------------------------------|---------------------------| |數位簽章定義Digital Signature Definitions|[http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions](http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions)| Font|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/restricted-font| |StartPartStartPart|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/fixedrepresentation| |StoryFragmentsStoryFragments|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/storyfragments| 如需封裝關聯性詳細資訊，請參閱區段 1.3*開放封裝慣例 (OPC)* 規格下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship (Uri targetUri, System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType, string id);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship(class System.Uri targetUri, valuetype System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType, string id) cil managed
public: System::IO::Packaging::PackageRelationship ^ CreateRelationship(Uri ^ targetUri, System::IO::Packaging::TargetMode targetMode, System::String ^ relationshipType, System::String ^ id);

param.name: targetUri
param.span: 目標組件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.

param.name: targetMode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

param.span: 例如，如果目標組件位於 內部，就是 ，如果目標組件是 外部的資源，就是 。

span.span: For example, if the target part is inside the ; or if the target is a resource outside the .

param.name: relationshipType
param.span: 關聯性的角色。

span.span: The role of the relationship.

param.name: id
param.span: 關聯性的唯一 ID。

span.span: A unique ID for the relationship.

summary.span: 建立這個 和指定目標 或外部資源之間的組件層級關係。

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

returns.span: 這個 與目標 或外部資源之間的組件層級關係。

span.span: The part-level relationship between this to the target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件層級關聯性定義這個組件的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 組件層級關聯性可以有兩種形式。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 來源之間目標內。Between a source to a target inside the . - 來源之間於封裝之外的目標資源。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在組件關聯性來源組件會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除來源組件時，會一併刪除的部分所擁有的所有關聯性。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 建立或刪除的關聯性的程序不會實際變更的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. `id` 必須是有效的 XML 識別碼。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id`型別是 xsd:ID，且必須遵照中規定的命名慣例*XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別*規格 (請參閱[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)). 方法不會實際變更來源組件，或目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 關聯性的目標不能是另一個關聯性。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如果`targetMode`指定為，`targetUri`必須是相對 URI，按照所使用的正確[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 內部的相對 URI 可以是絕對路徑，開頭為斜線 （"/"） 字元例如"/ page1.xaml"或"/ images/picture4.jpg"，或相對路徑，例如 「.../ imagespicture1.jpg"解析針對封裝根目錄 （"/"） 做為基底 URI。The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI. 如果`targetMode`指定為，`targetUri`可以是任一個絕對或相對 URI 格式根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 一般語法*規格。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 「http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml」 是絕對 URI 參照外部的目標資源 」 page2.xml 」 的範例。"http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml". 「 images/picture1.jpg"是相對 URI，也會參考外部的目標資源 」 1.jpg"但可解析針對封裝本身的 URI 的範例。"images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself. `relationshipType` 必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，形成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。`relationshipType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 不同的封裝類型可以定義不同的組件層級關聯性類型。Different package types can define different part-level relationship types. 下表顯示組件層級`relationshipType`Uri 定義文件符合*開啟 XML Paper Specification (XPS)*。The following table shows the part-level `relationshipType` URIs defined for documents that conform to the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*. |XPS 文件組件層級關聯性XPS Document Part-Level Relationship|URI 的關聯性類型Relationship Type URI| |-------------------------------------------|---------------------------| |數位簽章定義Digital Signature Definitions|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions| |DiscardControlDiscardControl|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/discard-control| |DocumentStructureDocumentStructure|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/documentstructure| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/printticket| |所需的資源Required Resource|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource| |受限制的字型Restricted Font|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/restricted-font| |StartPartStartPart|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/fixedrepresentation| |StoryFragmentsStoryFragments|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/storyfragments| 如需封裝關聯性詳細資訊，請參閱區段 1.3*開放封裝慣例 (OPC)* 規格下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 如需 XPS 文件，請參閱*開啟 XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).

summary.span: 刪除指定的組件層級 。

span.span: Deletes a specified part-level .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `id` 必須是有效的 XML 識別碼。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id`型別是 xsd:ID，且必須遵照中規定的命名慣例*XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別*規格 (請參閱[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)). 如果指定`id`不符沒有關聯性遭刪除任何此組件所擁有的關聯性，並擲回任何例外狀況。If the specified `id` does not match the for any of the relationships that are owned by this part, no relationship is deleted and no exception is thrown. 刪除指定的關聯性以外方法不會實際變更此組件或目標組件。Other than deleting the specified relationship, the method does not physically change either this part or the target part.

is .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual string GetContentTypeCore ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetContentTypeCore() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetContentTypeCore () As String
protected: virtual System::String ^ GetContentTypeCore();

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回組件內容的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 型別。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為虛擬方法的抽象基底類別。 is a virtual method of the abstract base class. 只在其中的內容類型的值不能在建構時提供的衍生類型中實作這個方法，或計算內容類型值是否為重要或最密切相關作業。Implement this method only in derived types where the value for the content type cannot be provided at the time of construction, or if calculating the content type value is a nontrivial or costly operation. 傳回值必須是有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]內容類型。The return value must be a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] content type. 在衍生的類別可以呼叫初始化衍生的類別設為預設值的屬性。Derived classes can call to initialize the property of the derived class to a default value. 之後屬性已設定無法變更。After the property has been set it cannot be changed.

exception.span: 衍生的類別不會提供 方法所需的覆寫實作。

span.span: The derived class does not provide an override implementation required for the method.

summary.span: 傳回部分內容資料流。

span.span: internally calls the derived method to actually open and return the part data stream based on the physical format implemented in the derived class.

para.span: 在預設作業會在內部呼叫的類別來開啟，並從 ZIP 檔案中傳回部分資料流。

span.span: In the default operation, internally calls of the class to open and return the part data stream from a ZIP file.

span.span: Gets the parent of the part.
The parent package of the part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可存取的唯讀屬性時，才父已開啟。 is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent is open. 屬性會自動設定建構函式。The property is automatically set by the constructor. 設定建構函式，父系之後無法變更組件。After it is set by the constructor, the parent for the part cannot be changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `id` 必須是有效的 XML 識別碼。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id`型別是 xsd:ID，且必須遵照中規定的命名慣例*XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別*規格 (請參閱[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)).
